definition: merchandise or commodities available immediately after sale/merchandise in stock/available item/actuals (investment)/actual commodities

sentences.english: We have every size of shoes in stock.
sentences.chinese: 本店備有各種尺寸鞋子的現貨。

sentences.english: This model is available with automatic transmission.
sentences.chinese: 這種裝有自動變速器的車有現貨。

sentences.english: Company abundant supply to use cash-based and reasonable price has advantages.
sentences.chinese: 公司貨源充足，以現貨爲主，價格合理有優勢。

sentences.english: Nylon fastening tapes with AZO free are available for108 colours.
sentences.chinese: 尼龍粘扣帶不含偶氮染料，常備108種顏色的現貨。

sentences.english: Guild cities will be moved to the same playfield and spot it has been before.
sentences.chinese: 公會城市將遷往同一操場和現貨已經收到。

sentences.english: And have off-the-shelf direct delivery to your company.
sentences.chinese: 並且有現貨供應，可直接送貨到貴公司。

sentences.english: And Chinese steel mills have been forced to make purchases on the spot market.
sentences.chinese: 中國的鋼鐵廠被迫在現貨市場購貨。

sentences.english: If you have pine kernels in stock, please send us some samples.
sentences.chinese: 如你們有松籽仁現貨，請寄來一些樣品。

sentences.english: At present the difference of market list price and spot price is every tons of 150 dollars.
sentences.chinese: 目前市場牌價和現貨價格的差距爲每噸150美元。

sentences.english: Depending upon a hedger's cash market situation.
sentences.chinese: 套期保值者根據自己在現貨市場的處境。

sentences.english: We can supply from stock and will have no trouble in meeting your delivery date.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以提供現貨並按你方所定的日期交貨。

sentences.english: Actuals available for delivery are traded for cash on a spot or forward basis.
sentences.chinese: 可供交割的現貨可在即期或遠期基礎上換成現金。

sentences.english: We now can offer from stock.
Has a large indoor pool, owned crane several, stock sufficient inventory.
sentences.chinese: 建有大型室內庫，自備吊車數臺，現貨庫存充足。

sentences.english: China Steel Association letter to the Department of Public Works suggested that the abolition of the spot ore trade.
sentences.chinese: 中鋼協向工信部提議，應徹底取消現貨礦貿易。

sentences.english: It works much like other spot markets.
sentences.chinese: 它如同其他現貨市場一般。

definition: abbr. for 期貨合約|期货合约[qi1 huo4 he2 yue1], futures contract (finance)
entity/substance/thing that has a material existence (as opposed to a conceptual, virtual or online existence)/the real thing (as opposed to an image or model of it)
property or cash held in reserve/stock
